channel.title: No-IP Not working anymore
channel.description: Hey, Just wondering if anyone knows why IT says i need to be no-ip Plus or Enhanced to make a host name. IF anyone has a simple fix please help me out.

item.title: No-IP Not working anymore
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

ljay wilson:

Well I said that because people hardly ever reply to me but ive done everthing i needed with the server It runs for me but my no-ip dont work, I’ve replaced all the 127.0.0.1 with my no-ip what am i doing wrong?

If your computer or router is the one hosting the server, you can’t connect to the hosting no-ip…meaning you’ll have to connect with 127.0.0.1, but players will connect with no-ip.(what i do is keep a separate client with the ip as localhost)

Read full topic
